name: Clinic Schedule
description: A user can create a schedule with a button click, as well as chat with the staff.

name: PizzaPizza
description: My partner Jacen and I made an online order system for a restaurant.  We were both inspired by the restaurant we work at.

name: Pokedex
description: Along with partners Michelle and Dylan, I made a Pokédex with Django.  Users can add and view Pokémon.

name: Personal Library
description: My partner Richard and I made a personal library.  The library allows the user to make an account, edit the books, and make labels for them.

name: Asunder
description: For our Unit 1 project, my partner Logan and I made a rogue-like dungeon crawler titled Asunder.  It is a text-based game based loosely on Dante's Inferno.

name: Clock
description: A working clock that displays the day and time by the second.
